chainId.description: The chain ID (14: Flare, 19: Songbird) where this TSO provider is submitting prices

address.description: The checksummed address of the FTSO provider on the specified chain ID

sell_percentage.description: The percentage of the total reward that the TSO provider is instantly selling

claim_addresses.description: The addresses that the TSO provider is claiming the rewards to

name.description: The name of the TSO provider

website.description: A URI to the TSO provider website. Must use HTTPS

description.description: The description of the TSO provider

logoURI.description: A content URL for this TSO provider logo asset

signature.description: The signature public signature of the provider

general.description: The general information of the TSO provider (e.g. long description of TSO)
examples: general information about the cool oracle

infrastructure.description: The information about the infrastructure of the TSO provider
examples: infrastructure information about the cool oracle

safeguards.description: The information about the safeguards of the TSO provider
examples: safeguards information about the cool oracle

availability.description: The information about the availability of the TSO provider
examples: availability information about the cool oracle

selling.description: The information about the selling of the TSO provider
examples: selling information about the cool oracle

tooling.description: The information about the tooling of the TSO provider
examples: tooling information about the cool oracle
